name: ResourceBot
description: A Resource Management Tool for Discord Guilds

GRB_DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Copy your Token from Discord's developer area. Paste it here.

CHANNEL.description: Enter the name of your bot's channel on your Discord server, WITHOUT THE #

LANGUAGE.description: This will be your bot's default language for the guild. [de, en, es, pt]

OCR_RESULT.description: After it processes a screenshot, the bot will list the results so you can verify they are correct. If you change this to 'off', it won't.

DELETE_PICTURE_MESSAGE.description: If you change this to 'on', the bot will delete a screenshot after it processes it.

JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS.description: Memory instructions so this project can run on a free Heroku plan - DO NOT CHANGE!!

TESS_DATA.description: Path for the tessdata files - DO NOT CHANGE!!
